name: Metal Gear Tribute Game
description:
A short "remake" of shadow moses 

I made a finished version and with a level of polish for the marathon jam , but there are things I still want to do , so I will keep developing

CONTROLS :

>>>>>

W,A,S,D - basic movement

C - between stand , crouch and prone ( for going to prone , hold C )

1 - Toggle Between Weapons

R - reload weapon

-

left mouse button - shoot

riht mouse button - aim 

>>>>>

hope you enjoy it 🙂 , feel free to comment any bugs , or thing you disliked
